description: This file defines a React component for handling OAuth callback redirects in a web application, specifically for '/oauth/callback' route. It manages query parameters, routing, and rendering fallback UI during redirect processing.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main React component that displays a suspense boundary wrapping the inner OAuth callback handler.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Handles extracting query parameters, determining the redirect target, and performing the redirect logic.
